title: Kinetic energy decreases in which situation

content.question: In which of the following situations is the kinetic energy of the object decreasing?

choices.label: A sphere is dropped from a building.
A satellite is moving in a circular orbit around Earth.
A baseball is heading upward after being thrown at an angle.
An elevator is moving upward at a constant velocity.

content.answer: A baseball is heading upward after being thrown at an angle.
